comment_text: Perhaps OT: I often swing by Java web/services frameworks every year or so and I never see a good DB migration/evolution story.  I'm fairly certain that it's because I don't know where to look or that I'm thinking about it incorrectly, but I've yet to see a Java web/services framework that supports the easy database migration/evolution schemes of Django/South or of Rails.  Are these migration schemes not supported for a reason?  Or am I missing the docs?
author: CoffeeDregs
story_title: A Java EE Startup: Filtering information with zeef.com
